column1: Unión de Reyes is a municipality and town in the Matanzas Province of Cuba. It is located in the western part of the province
Unión de Reyes was founded in 1844
column2: and it was established as a municipality on July 1
column3: 1879. Its name derives from Unión en el Punto de Reyes
column4: so named for its location at a railway junction.

column2: originally divided into the barrios of Iglesia and Unión
column3: is divided into 9 consejos populares (i.e. "people's councils"): the town of Unión de Reyes and the villages of Alacranes
column9: Juan G. Gómez and Puerto Rico.

column2: the municipality of Unión de Reyes had a population of 40
column3: 022. With a total area of 856 km2 (331 sq mi)
column4: it has a population density of 46.8/km2 (121/sq mi).
